bike.description: 2006 P-frame, A1 Premium Aluminum, Freeride HT Dirt Jumping/ Street/MTB design, double butted ORE DT and TT, forged/releived " " HT and ISCG BB, 6mm offset rear triangle and forged horizontal drop-outs with integrated chain tensioner and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Marzocchi DJ Urban, 110mm "Disc" model, SSV dampening, 1-piece magnesium lower for 20mm axle, alloy steerer, alloy 32mm stanchions, bolt on cold forged alloy crown, coil spring w/ air assist and external rebound adjustment
Specialized OS Freeride, 6 degree upsweep, 9 degree backsweep, 660mm width
Truvativ Holtzfeller, forged 7050 w/ E.13 STS 32 special chain guide w/ lexan grind guard
Truvativ Howitzer Team, 57mm chainline, external alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing
Specialized Lo-Pro Mag II, sealed cartridge bearing
Sun MTX S-Type, 26", 36 hole with eyelets
Specialized 20mm Thru-axle, sealed cartridge bearing with axle peg compatible axle kit
Specialized bolt-on, cartridge sealed bearing cassette
Specialized Rhythm Pro, 26x2.3", dual compound w/ aramid bead
Specialized Rhythm Pro, 26x2.3", dual compound w/ aramid bead
Specialized Fuse SL, superlight foam, 9mm hollow Cr-Mo rails and Aramid sides
Fuse SL, 6061-T6 w/ oversised M8 bolts, 30.9x300/350mm
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
